content:
I am trying to run NCTS demo on Postman and I get 401 error on several API examples e.g. CodeSystem Lookup due to no authentication.
What is NCTS authentication setup?
I am a registered user of NCTS server.
I imported NCTS environment.
I created credentials in NCTS site and pasted them into NCTS environment and now no longer get 401 errors but full results!
